name: Cut the Grass
description:
With Cut the Grass, mowing the lawn has never been so satisfying!

Swipe in a direction to move your saw and cut all the grass on the lawn.

Enjoy the satisfaction of a perfectly trimmed lawn and complete all the gardens of each street!

Unlock new blades and become the best lawn mower of the city!

Cut the Grass features:

- Easy swipe controls
- Smooth 3D environment
- Satisfying level based gameplay
- Fast, fun and short lawns to clear
